Answers.MP Summary: print machine hardware name (same as uname -m)
Top-3 Scripts:
so_18677113: arch=$(getconf LONG_BIT)
echo "I'm $arch-bit"
if [ "$arch" = "64" ]
then
    mv /tmp/autoscript/file-x64 /var/destination
else
    mv /tmp/autoscript/file-x32 /var/destination
fi

arch=$(getconf LONG_BIT)
echo "I'm $arch-bit"
mv /tmp/autoscript/file-x$arch /var/destination
